name: CSR app for groceries
short_description:
I have an Idea of an app that I think can make big impact how do you think I should proceed with it? I dont know any coding at all..

So just to be breif of the Idea;
Today we have enourmous amount of diffrent products made of global companies all around the world, some good some bad. for the people that are involved and knowing what companies is good, (not cutting down rainforest, polluting et.c e.t.c ) and take their responsibility and what companies that is bad and Only thinking of maximize profit.

For me as a "Normal" person its kind of hard to know which vegi oil to buy, etc. and if the company is good, middle or bad. and also if this brand is owned by another bigger giant that is not so good... 

So what I wanna fo is to develop an app that recognize logos of brands and give me information straight in my phone, good, middle and bad and also why this is.

So a simple tool for me as a consumer that helps me to choose brands that take their responsibility.
summary: help-tool for cunsumers to choose groceries from "good" companies

os.fullpath: Operating System :: Handheld/Embedded Operating Systems :: Android
Operating System :: Handheld/Embedded Operating Systems :: Apple iPhone
